freely.translation[0].definitions[0].def: without anyone stopping or limiting something
freely.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: the countryâ€™s first freely elected president
EU members are allowed to travel freely between member states.
In France he could write freely, without fear of arrest.
We went outside so that we could talk freely without being overheard.
freely.translation[0].definitions[1].def: if something moves freely, it moves smoothly and nothing prevents it from doing this
freely.translation[0].definitions[1].exa: If your muscles are tense, blood cannot circulate freely.
The injury prevented him from moving freely.
